name: Yokoi-san Warp
description:
Yokoi-san Warp
よこいさん　ワープする

//Genre
　　　　Action Game

// Introduction

　　　　This game is a Shooting Game with puzzle elements created with
　　　　HSP3 during the "GBJAM #5" on itch.io. It ranked 2nd in the
　　　　Overall category among 400 entries from all over the world.

　　　　The basic version of this game was developed during the 10-day
　　　　submission period of GBJAM #5 (Oct 1 - Oct 10, 2016). Afterwards
　　　　the development was continued and resulted in this demo version.

　　　　GBJAM #5: https://itch.io/jam/gbjam-5/results

// How to Play

　　　　Just start Yokoi-san_Warp.exe.

　　　　Switch places with enemies and missiles by using your Warp Gun!
　　　　Time your warps right to make your enemies blow themselves up
　　　　while paying attention to your Warp Points.

// Game Controls

　　　　# Keyboard
　　　　Arrow Keys: Move
　　　　　　　　　　　Z: Confirm, Warp Gun
　　　　　　　　　　　X: Cancel, Menu

　　　　# Gamepad
　　　　　　　D-pad : Move
　　　　　　Button 1: Confirm, Warp Gun
　　　　　　Button 2: Cancel, Menu

// Development Staff

　　　　Game Design
　　　　Graphics
　　　　　　　　VeLTiNA (@veltina_soft)

　　　　Programming
　　　　　　　　26C

　　　　Sound
　　　　　　　　Ronto

// Translation Support

　　　　Translation
